My Blog

Why I’m Interested in COBOL and Frameworks

In today’s rapidly evolving tech world, diving into a classic like COBOL might seem unconventional, but for me, it’s a fascinating journey. COBOL’s long-standing presence in industries like banking, insurance, and government reflects its reliability and resilience. Its ability to process massive amounts of data with precision makes it invaluable in sectors where stability is critical. What I appreciate about COBOL is its straightforward and business-oriented syntax. Unlike modern languages that often prioritize complexity, COBOL was designed to be readable and maintainable, which aligns well with my preference for structured, logical programming. Frameworks in the COBOL ecosystem further enhance its usability by modernizing workflows and integrating with contemporary systems. Tools that allow COBOL applications to interface with APIs or work in cloud environments excite me because they bring a timeless language into the future. By exploring COBOL and its frameworks, I feel connected to the roots of programming while addressing today’s demands. It’s this blend of tradition and innovation that keeps me motivated and eager to learn more.

Malsini Masachchige
